text: Fran Gerbič Fran Gerbič (5 October 1840, Cerknica – 29 March 1917, Ljubljana) was a Slovenian composer and operatic tenor. During the 1940s he was one of the best-known composers of Yugoslavia abroad.Journal of Central European Affairs: 1947 "The most famous composers are Fran Gerbic (1840-1917), opera singer and composer of piano and orchestral music;" ==Works== Operas * Kres (Midsummer) 1896 * Nabor 1913 Songs * Kam?
